Chop and Brody both saw the tiny tracker planted on Nightrazor leave
the pr=
emises.

Brody: Alright! We did it!

Chop: Yeah! Let's report!

Brody opene=
d a channel to Jotunn: Sir! The intruder has been routed
sir! Returning to =
your position.

Jotunn: Great! We'll get that going!

**********

Jotunn cl=
osed the channel and turned to Dinobot.

Jotunn: Well, you heard them. Let'=
s be off since the watch has been
dropped. Fly us to the Ark.

Dinobot smil=
ed with a toothy predatory grin.

Dinobot: With pleasure!

He revved up the=
 engines, and soon, the shuttle was up and flying
northwest.
